allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix database migrations, API auth, and UI issues

Database:
- Add missing design_rules table migration \(013_design_rules.sql\)
- Fix duplicate index names in campaigns migration
- Add SET search_path = public to trigger functions for auth context
- Remove duplicate migration files

API:
- Add getApiUserId\(\) function that throws instead of redirecting
- Update all API routes to use getApiUserId\(\) for proper error handling
- Add missing API routes: design-rules, integrations, setup-progress, pinterest analytics

UI:
- Add 14 missing dashboard pages \(approvals, assets, pinterest/*, leads/*, etc.\)
- Fix navigation.ts to match actual page routes
- Add cursor-pointer to Button, Card \(hoverable\), and interactive elements
- Implement notifications dropdown with mock data
- Fix sidebar active state to use exact matching \(prevents multiple highlights\)
- Add cursor-pointer and hover effect to sidebar section headers

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(1 <<'EOF'
SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables 
WHERE table_schema = 'public' AND table_name = 'integrations';
EOF)
Bash(for table in campaigns campaign_tasks seasonal_templates pin_winners exports pin_schedule_history)

Bash(git -C /Users/dvolkens/haven-hub-v2 commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix missing database tables in production

Add repair migrations for tables that were recorded as applied but
never actually created in production:

From 018_campaigns.sql:
- campaigns \(seasonal campaign management\)
- campaign_tasks \(scheduled activities\)
- seasonal_templates \(8 system templates seeded\)

From 022_winners_exports.sql:
- pin_winners \(top performing pin tracking\)
- exports \(data export jobs\)
- pin_schedule_history \(publishing history\)
- pins.is_winner column

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/dvolkens/haven-hub-v2 commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement V1 Feature Parity Phase 1

Phase 1 \(High Priority\) features implemented:

Pinterest Conversion API \(Server-Side Events\):
- Add pinterest_conversion_events table for server-side tracking
- Implement conversion-api.ts with event tracking functions
- Add cron job to batch send events to Pinterest every 5 minutes

Enhanced Performance Alerts:
- Add performance_alert_rules and performance_alerts tables
- Implement alert-service.ts with CRUD and evaluation logic
- Add API routes for alerts and rules management
- Add cron job to evaluate rules every 15 minutes
- Create settings/alerts page for rule configuration UI

Complete Seasonal Rotation:
- Implement seasonal-service.ts with 16 seasonal periods
- Update seasonal-activation cron to activate/deactivate pins
- Respect assisted vs auto mode \(creates approval items\)

Klaviyo Setup Wizard:
- Add setup-status API to check connection, lists, events
- Add setup API to create required lists and send test events
- Create email/setup page with step-by-step wizard UI

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/dvolkens/haven-hub-v2 commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Klaviyo list detection and revenue display

Klaviyo Setup:
- Fix case-insensitive list name comparison \(lists showing as
  missing even when they exist with different casing\)
- Add pagination support to getLists\(\) to fetch all lists

Email Dashboard:
- Add defensive number validation in metrics API to prevent
  arrays from being displayed as currency values
- Add frontend validation to ensure numeric formatting

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/dvolkens/haven-hub-v2 commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix revenue page array-to-string display bugs

- Add defensive number validation in revenue API route
- Add safeNumber/formatCurrency helpers in revenue page frontend

Fixes: Total Orders and Total Revenue showing arrays instead of sums

Bash(git -C /Users/dvolkens/haven-hub-v2 commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix list detection and make recommended flows dynamic

Klaviyo Setup:
- Add robust normalize function for list name comparison
- Handle unicode dash variants \(en-dash, em-dash, etc.\)
- Add debug logging for list comparison

Flows Page:
- Make recommended flows show "Active" badge when matching flow exists
- Highlight cards with green border when flow is already set up
- Show actual flow name when matched

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

EOF

Bash(git -C /Users/dvolkens/haven-hub-v2 commit -m "Remove placeholder Recommended Flows section

The static flow suggestions were not useful - users can manage
flows directly in Klaviyo.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C /Users/dvolkens/haven-hub-v2 commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove fake flow metrics - show only real Klaviyo data

The flows page was showing random placeholder data that changed
on each refresh. Now it shows:
- Real flow counts \(active, draft, paused, total\)
- Real flow names, status, and triggers from Klaviyo
- Link to view metrics in Klaviyo directly

Per-flow metrics require Klaviyo''s premium Flow Analytics API.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/dvolkens/haven-hub-v2 commit -m "Fix double /api prefix in email-workflows API calls

The fetcher already adds /api prefix, so remove it from API calls
in workflows pages to prevent /api/api/ URLs.
